snippet.title: Fairy Tail - PV2
snippet.description:
#FairyTail is set to be released in North America 
PS4/Switch: 7/31/20
PC: 7/30/20

FAIRY TAIL’s extraordinary world of magic and dragons is captured in remarkable detail throughout this all-new gaming experience, with a phenomenal focus of delivering the type of magic and mystique fans of the worldwide sensation anime and manga series have been craving.
